description: AI-Assisted Executive Support System - Capture decisions and tasks from meetings/emails with human-in-the-loop approval

userStories.title: Create SharePoint decision archive schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to define the SharePoint list schema for storing archived decisions.
acceptanceCriteria: Create SharePoint list definition with columns: DecisionId, DecisionText, MeetingReference, Approver, ApprovalDate, OriginalAISuggestion, ConfidenceScore, Status
Include metadata columns: CreatedAt, ModifiedAt, SourceType (meeting/email/chat)
Define column types: DecisionText as multiline, ConfidenceScore as number 0-100
Typecheck passes

Status enum: Suggested, Approved, Rejected, Modified
Include audit fields: createdAt, approvedBy, approvalTimestamp, rejectionReason
Typecheck passes
